sqlMap.select: select DETAIL_ID, PARAM_ID, DETAIL_NAME, DETAIL_KEY, DETAIL_VALUE from T02_DATA_PARAM_DETAIL where PARAM_ID = '$paramId$'
sqlMap.insert: insert into T02_DATA_PARAM_DETAIL (DETAIL_ID,PARAM_ID, DETAIL_NAME, DETAIL_KEY, DETAIL_VALUE) VALUES ('$detailId$','$paramId$', '$detailName$', '$detailKey$', '$detailValue$')
